name: PeopleSoft: Naming convention on Language Record Table
description: Language records are identified by the suffix (defined in a parameter list)
rationale: A language record table is a record. In that case, they must be considered as exceptions for object type record table and they must be identified by a specific naming convention.
remediation: Rename the object using the good naming convention and research all the references to this object using the old reference (function find reference and find in in the application designer)
total: Number of PeopleSoft Lang record tables (ADDED)
